name: OtpAuthPayload
summary: Parsed contents of an otpauth:// URI.

properties.name: Period
properties.summary: Gets the TOTP period in seconds (null for HOTP).

properties.name: Counter
properties.summary: Gets the HOTP counter (null for TOTP).

properties.name: IsTotp
properties.summary: Gets whether this payload is TOTP.

properties.name: IsHotp
properties.summary: Gets whether this payload is HOTP.
